title: 86/104/EEC: Commission Decision of 24 February 1986 on the implementation of the reform of agricultural structure in Ireland pursuant to Title III of Council Regulation (EEC) No 797/85 (Only the English text is authentic)
header:
COMMISSION  DECISION
of 24 February 1986
on the implementation of the reform of agricultural structure in Ireland pursuant to Title III of Council Regulation (EEC) No 797/85
(Only the English text is authentic)
(86/104/EEC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: The administrative provisions for the implementation of Title III of Regulation (EEC) No 797/85 in Ireland listed in the preamble hereto satisfy the conditions for financial contribution by the Community to common measures.
This Decision is addressed to Ireland.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 24 February 1986.
For the Commission
Frans ANDRIESSEN
Vice-President
(1) OJ No L 93, 30. 3. 1985, p. 1.
